item.description:
We continue our White Tour de France by moving away from the cooler northern and eastern parts of France into the warmer southern and western regions. First up--Bourdeaux!

Long reknown for its cabernet sauvignon- and merlot-based blends that have often defined the ultimate in wine, Bourdeaux also makes whites ranging from muscadelle to sauvignon blanc and semillon. Join us for a tasting tour of Bourdeaux's white wines.

If anyone can recommend or provide a Sauternes, we'll end the evening on a sweet note.

As always, volunteers for wine buying (with reimbursement) and appetizers are gratefully accepted!

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: October Meeting--White wines of Bourdeaux!
